name: Trail Runner
description:
Title: Line Runner

 Platform: PC Game Genre: 2D Platformer

 Platformer Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This is based on the 2D Platformer Micro Game. It allows for movement through an open area with many basic platformer controls. This project was made as a part of the Game Design Challenge 4 where we were tasked to use a unity microgame to create a digital game. This project served as an introduction to digital game development.
